ImageScale.label: Image Scale
ImageScale.tooltip: Default size is 300px. This is the scale of that.

ItemModel.label: Item Shape
ItemModel.tooltip: The item shape that can change the way it bounces

ScreenMap.label: Screen Map
ScreenMap.tooltip: This adds a 'map' of items on the screen for items to bounce around against.

MaxItems.label: Maximum Items Per Event
MaxItems.tooltip: The maximum number of items that can be added per event, stricter than the percentage restrictions

GlobalMaxItems.label: Total Maximum Items
GlobalMaxItems.tooltip: The maximum number of items that can exist on the screen.

GlobalObjectTTL.label: Item Life Span (seconds)
GlobalObjectTTL.tooltip: The number of seconds before the item leaves. 0 = never removed. This is the global value, for any specific Life Spans that are set to 0.

ClearAllItems.label: Clear All Items
ClearAllItems.tooltip: Remove all items from the canvas

ResetAllDefault.label: Reset Settings
ResetAllDefault.tooltip: Resets all settings back to the defaults

OpenOverlayInBrowser.label: Open Overlay In Browser
OpenOverlayInBrowser.tooltip: Opens overlay in browser for testing

ItemDensity.label: Item Density
ItemDensity.tooltip: Defines the density of the body, that is its mass per unit area.

ItemFriction.label: Item Friction
ItemFriction.tooltip: Defines the friction of the item

ItemAirFriction.label: Item Air Friction
ItemAirFriction.tooltip: Defines the air resistance of the item.

ItemRestitution.label: Item Restitution
ItemRestitution.tooltip: Defines the elasticity of the item.

ChatObjectTTL.label: Item Life Span (seconds)
ChatObjectTTL.tooltip: If 0, will fall back to the global Item Life Span

UseGlobalChatCooldown.label: Use Global Chat Cooldown
UseGlobalChatCooldown.tooltip: This will apply cooldown if anyone chats, not based on a specific person.

ChatCooldown.label: Chat Cooldown (seconds)
ChatCooldown.tooltip: The cooldown between each event before it will trigger another one

ChatMultiplier.label: Item Multiplier
ChatMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply the number of items for a chat event.

ChatEmoteMultiplier.label: Emote Multiplier
ChatEmoteMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply the number of items for a chat event.

ChatEmojiMultiplier.label: Emoji Multiplier
ChatEmojiMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply the number of items for a chat event.

SendChatEvent.label: Test Chat Message Event
SendChatEvent.tooltip: Sends a test event to the overlay

SendTestEmoteEvent.label: Test Chat Emote Event
SendTestEmoteEvent.tooltip: Sends a test event to the overlay

SendTestEmojiEvent.label: Test Chat Emoji Event
SendTestEmojiEvent.tooltip: Sends a test event to the overlay

FollowObjectTTL.label: Item Life Span (seconds)
FollowObjectTTL.tooltip: If 0, will fall back to the global Item Life Span

FollowCooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
FollowCooldown.tooltip: The cooldown between each event before it will trigger another one

FollowMultiplier.label: Item Multiplier
FollowMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply the number of items for a follow event.

SendTwitchFollowEvent.label: Test TWITCH Follow Event
SendTwitchFollowEvent.tooltip: Sends a test event to the overlay

DonationObjectTTL.label: Item Life Span (seconds)
DonationObjectTTL.tooltip: If 0, will fall back to the global Item Life Span

DonationCooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
DonationCooldown.tooltip: The cooldown between each event before it will trigger another one

DonationMinimum.label: Donation Minimum
DonationMinimum.tooltip: The minimum number of dollars they need to donate for this to add

DonationMultiplier.label: Item Multiplier
DonationMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply the number of items for a donation event.

DonationPercent.label: Donation Percentage
DonationPercent.tooltip: The percentage of items to add based on donation dollars. Minimum will be 1 item.

SendDonationEvent.label: Test STREAMLABS Donation Event
SendDonationEvent.tooltip: Sends a test event to the overlay

SubscriptionObjectTTL.label: Item Life Span (seconds)
SubscriptionObjectTTL.tooltip: If 0, will fall back to the global Item Life Span

SubscriptionCooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
SubscriptionCooldown.tooltip: The cooldown between each event before it will trigger another one

SubscriptionMinimum.label: Months Minimum
SubscriptionMinimum.tooltip: The minimum number of months they need to be a subscriber for this to add

SubscriptionGiftedMinimum.label: Gifted Minimum
SubscriptionGiftedMinimum.tooltip: The minimum number of gifted subs for this to add

SubscriptionMultiplier.label: Item Multiplier
SubscriptionMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply the number of items for a subscription event.

SubscriptionPercent.label: Subscription Percentage
SubscriptionPercent.tooltip: The percentage of items to add based on months subscribed. Minimum will be 1 item.

SendSubscriptionEvent.label: Test Sub/Resub Event
SendSubscriptionEvent.tooltip: Sends a test event to the overlay

SendGiftSubscriptionEvent.label: Test Gifted Sub Event
SendGiftSubscriptionEvent.tooltip: Sends a test event to the overlay

SendCommunityGiftSubscriptionEvent.label: Test Community Gifted Event
SendCommunityGiftSubscriptionEvent.tooltip: Sends a test event to the overlay

EnableHost.label: Enable Host / Raid
EnableHost.tooltip: Add item if someone hosts / raids

HostObjectTTL.label: Item Life Span (seconds)
HostObjectTTL.tooltip: If 0, will fall back to the global Item Life Span

HostMinimum.label: Viewer Minimum
HostMinimum.tooltip: The minimum number of viewers for this to add item for a host / raid

HostCooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
HostCooldown.tooltip: The cooldown between each event before it will trigger another one

HostMultiplier.label: Item Multiplier
HostMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply the number of items for a host / raid event.

HostPercent.label: Host / Raid Percentage
HostPercent.tooltip: The percentage of items to viewers to add. Minimum will be 1 item.

SendHostEvent.label: Test TWITCH Host / Raid Event
SendHostEvent.tooltip: Sends a test event to the overlay

EnableCheer.label: Enable Cheer
EnableCheer.tooltip: Add items if someone cheers bits

CheerObjectTTL.label: Item Life Span (seconds)
CheerObjectTTL.tooltip: If 0, will fall back to the global Item Life Span

CheerCooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
CheerCooldown.tooltip: The cooldown between each event before it will trigger another one

CheerMinimum.label: Cheer Minimum
CheerMinimum.tooltip: The minimum number of bits for this to add item for a cheer

CheerMultiplier.label: Item Multiplier
CheerMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply the number of items for a cheer event.

CheerPercent.label: Cheer Percentage
CheerPercent.tooltip: The percentage of items to add based on bits cheered. Minimum will be 1 item.

SendTwitchCheerEvent.label: Test TWITCH Cheer Event
SendTwitchCheerEvent.tooltip: Sends a test event to the overlay

StreamlabsToken.label: Streamlabs Socket Token
StreamlabsToken.tooltip: The Streamlabs Socket Token. This can be found on the website via the left-hand side menu -> API Settings -> API Tokens.

OpenSLAPISettingsLink.label: Get your Socket Token here
OpenSLAPISettingsLink.tooltip: Click here to go to the Streamlabs API settings page

TwitchClientId.label: Twitch Client-ID
TwitchClientId.tooltip: The Twitch CLIENT-ID. Register an application and use the Client-ID here.

OpenTwitchClientIdLink.label: Get your Twitch Client ID Here
OpenTwitchClientIdLink.tooltip: Click here to register for your Twitch Client-ID
